analysis.description:
ALXERC20.transfer (/unique_chucks/16/0x67a05bec35f411daea826f16ba0cf3ab7843b7e7.sol#144-163) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > icoEnd) (/unique_chucks/16/0x67a05bec35f411daea826f16ba0cf3ab7843b7e7.sol#147-149)

ALXERC20.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/16/0x67a05bec35f411daea826f16ba0cf3ab7843b7e7.sol#163-185) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > icoEnd) (/unique_chucks/16/0x67a05bec35f411daea826f16ba0cf3ab7843b7e7.sol#170)

ALX.withdrawReward (/unique_chucks/16/0x67a05bec35f411daea826f16ba0cf3ab7843b7e7.sol#302-340) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp - requestWithdraws[msg.sender][roundCounter].time[i] > holdTime && block.timestamp - requestWithdraws[msg.sender][roundCounter].time[i] < holdMax (/unique_chucks/16/0x67a05bec35f411daea826f16ba0cf3ab7843b7e7.sol#304-318)
